Added params for setting follow target and p gain. [1a828ef](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/1a828ef91205b65b17d5fa297e41882e83cd65b4)

Disabling the `Move To` menu when `Follow`  mode is enabled seems to be more difficult than expected. The entity context menu needs to know the current state of the user camera but it currently doesn’t because it’s an standalone module. I have to rethink about  how the context menu should be implemented. It may have to be an integral part of the Scene3d plugin. For now, I fixed the camera jumping issue when `Move To` is requested.  [1a828ef](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/1a828ef91205b65b17d5fa297e41882e83cd65b4)
